title: Just get rid of URF
body:
People can't play for fun, so its useless to give them a fun mode, theyll tryhard it to the max.

All games are a roflstomp of who picked the most op champs, then the winning team doesnt even have the decency to finish, they have to spawn camp your nexus and kill you again and again.

replies.body: You seem to be playing a very different game from me... I've had only positive experiences in URF. The roflstomp happens, and it's fun as hell no matter what side you're on. I haven't had anybody delay finishing a game for kills, and even if that did happen, surrender is a thing. I can't say I understand where all the negativity is coming from.

They come mostly from the tryhards. Nothing is worse than being told to pick this champ because they are, "better in URF than the one you picked". I was literally just told that and he raged that i picked a "useless champ". (Because let's face it, {{champion:157}} is the only one you shouldn't really pick in URF :3 )

Like wtf i aint here to win, im here to have FUN!!!

I 100% agree with the OP.
There's a reason why temporary gamemodes are temporary.

{{champion:31}} {{champion:16}} Never underestimate the power of instant spammable sillences in a game where using your abilities is what's important. 

I love playing those two.
But what if an ADC appears? {{champion:429}}
Most people build full AP/AD on champs in URF so I imagine it'll just be a race to who can delete the other faster.

I was honestly hoping to play NURF for this very reason.  Last year's URF was starting to go that direction toward the end, and with most of those people playing again this year it just continued down that really annoying path.

Stop bitching about urf

So stupid.
I just want to play AP Nasus, not get flamed for doing poorly against these 10-spear-a-second Nidalee players...
My champ abilities just completely stopped working... i could still auto attack, but what fun is auto attack in urf?

Thats why you ban the OP champions. I dont think it should be removed. Its acually REALLY fun and If u think others are playing the op champs. Just play someone op, Like hecarim. He is acually pretty fun. Please dont remove.

> [{quoted}](name=BooDaTitan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9RlT0LF4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-07T03:44:31.224+0000)
>
> Thats why you ban the OP champions. I dont think it should be removed. Its acually REALLY fun and If u think others are playing the op champs. Just play someone op, Like hecarim. He is acually pretty fun. Please dont remove.

Do you even listen to yourself? ''If you think they play op stuff, play op stuff too'' what about i play whatever the fuk i want, and not have to be dictated by what is good or not on what is supposed to be a god damn troll mode?
You only get 3 bans, there are way more than 3, or even 6, OP champs in URF.
But urf is like the best!!!! Its so fun

Thats literally the point of the game. It doesn't matter who wins or loses. To be honest sometimes I have as much fun being rofl stomped while playing a fun champ (ap reksai the goddess) then winning while playing an op champ.
